extension.summary: Plays live video and audio streams from 4d.rtvslo.si
Predvaja žive tv in radijske oddaje 4d.rtvslo.si
extension.description: RTV Slovenija is a national radio and television public broadcast organization. With this plugin you can watch both video and audio live broadcast.
RTV Slovenija je državna radiotelevizijska organizacija. S tem vtičnikom si lahko ogledate vse televizijske in radijske oddaje v živo.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2019-01-09) - plays live streams only, for podcasts see plugin.rtvslo.podcast
v1.0.0 (2019-01-09) - predvaja izključno žive oddaje, za arhivske posnetke glej plugin.rtvslo.podcast
